name: FAQtly
body:
### Welcome to FAQtly

This is an open source Sinatra application to manage FAQ:

### Installation
```
$ # Fork it
$ git clone git@github.com:<you>/faqtly.git
```

### Features
* Manage FAQ
* Search FAQ

### Authors and Contributors
Ernesto Tagwerker (@etagwerker) and Leandro Marcucci (@leanucci).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with FAQtly? Create an issue at http://github.com/ombushop/faqtly/issues.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
